definitions.text: a porous mass of interlacing fibers that forms the internal skeleton of various marine animals and usable to absorb water or any porous rubber or cellulose product similarly used
someone able to acquire new knowledge and skills rapidly and easily
examples: she soaks up foreign languages like a sponge

definitions.text: a follower who hangs around a host (without benefit to the host) in hope of gain or advantage
primitive multicellular marine animal whose porous body is supported by a fibrous skeletal framework; usually occurs in sessile colonies
wipe with a sponge, so as to clean or moisten
ask for and get free; be a parasite
erase with a sponge; as of words on a blackboard
